SEARCH
Package com.github.walker84837.JResult

Class Result<T,E>

java.lang.Object
com.github.walker84837.JResult.Result<T,E>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the success value.
E - The type of the error value.
Direct Known Subclasses:
Result.Err, Result.Ok
public abstract sealed class Result<T,E> extends Object permits Result.Ok<T,E>, Result.Err<T,E>
JResult - A Result type that represents either a success (Ok) or a failure (Err).

This class is implemented as a sealed abstract class to guarantee that only the permitted subclasses Result.Ok and Result.Err can exist.

    • isOk

      public abstract boolean isOk()
      Returns true if the result is an Ok variant.
      Returns:
      true if success, false otherwise.

    • isErr

      public abstract boolean isErr()
      Returns true if the result is an Err variant.
      Returns:
      true if error, false otherwise.

    • unwrap

      public abstract T unwrap() throws IllegalStateException
      Unwraps the success value.
      Returns:
      the success value.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is an error.

      Unwraps the error value.
      Returns:
      the error value.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is a success.

      public abstract T unwrapOr(T defaultValue)

      Parameters:
      defaultValue - the default value.
      Returns:
      the success value or defaultValue.

    • unwrapOrElse

      public abstract T unwrapOrElse(Function<E,T> fallback)
      Returns the success value if present, or computes it from the error using the fallback function.
      Parameters:
      fallback - a function to compute a success value if this is an error.
      Returns:
      the success value or the computed value.

    • err

      public static <T, E> Result<T,E> err(E error)

      E - the type of the error value.
      Parameters:
      error - the error value.
      Returns:
      a new Err instance.

    • toStream

      public Stream<T> toStream()
      Converts this Result to a Stream containing the success value if present.
      Returns:
      a one‐element Stream with the success value, or an empty Stream if this is Err.

    • fold

      public <R> R fold(Function<T,R> onOk, Function<E,R> onErr)
      Applies either onOk or onErr, depending on whether this Result is Ok or Err.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the result type of the fold operation.
      Parameters:
      onOk - function to transform the success value (type T → R) if this is Ok.
      onErr - function to transform the error value (type E → R) if this is Err.
      Returns:
      the value returned by onOk.apply(unwrappedSuccess) or onErr.apply(unwrappedError).

    • and

      public <U> Result<U,E> and(Result<U,E> other)
      Returns the provided result if this is Ok, otherwise returns this Err.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the alternative success value.
      Parameters:
      other - the alternative result.
      Returns:
      other if this is Ok; otherwise, this Err.

    • andThen

      public <U> Result<U,E> andThen(Function<T,Result<U,E>> op)
      Calls the provided mapping function with the success value and returns its result if this is Ok. Otherwise, returns this Err.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the mapped success value.
      Parameters:
      op - the function to apply on the success value.
      Returns:
      the mapped result if success; otherwise, this Err.

    • or

      public Result<T,E> or(Result<T,E> other)
      Returns this Ok if it is success, otherwise returns the provided alternative.
      Parameters:
      other - the alternative result.
      Returns:
      this if Ok; otherwise other.

    • orElse

      public <F> Result<T,F> orElse(Function<E,Result<T,F>> op)
      Calls the provided function with the error value and returns its result if this is Err. Otherwise, returns this Ok.
      Type Parameters:
      F - the new type of error.
      Parameters:
      op - the function to handle the error.
      Returns:
      this if Ok; otherwise, the result produced by the function.

    • map

      public <U> Result<U,E> map(Function<T,U> mapper)
      Maps the success value using the provided function if this is Ok. Otherwise, returns this Err.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the mapped success value.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to map the success value.
      Returns:
      a new Result with the mapped success value, or this Err.

    • mapErr

      public <F> Result<T,F> mapErr(Function<E,F> mapper)
      Maps the error value using the provided function if this is Err. Otherwise, returns this Ok.
      Type Parameters:
      F - the type of the mapped error value.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to map the error value.
      Returns:
      a new Result with the mapped error value, or this Ok.

    • inspect

      public Result<T,E> inspect(Consumer<T> inspector)

      Parameters:
      inspector - a consumer to inspect the success value.
      Returns:
      this Result unchanged.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this Result unchanged.

    • isOkAnd

      public boolean isOkAnd(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Returns true if this is Ok and the success value satisfies the given predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - a predicate to test the success value.
      Returns:
      true if this is Ok and the predicate returns true; otherwise false.

    • isErrAnd

      public boolean isErrAnd(Predicate<E> predicate)
      Returns true if this is Err and the error value satisfies the given predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - a predicate to test the error value.
      Returns:
      true if this is Err and the predicate returns true; otherwise false.

    • expect

      public T expect(String msg)
      Unwraps the success value if present, or throws an IllegalStateException with the given message.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to use for the exception if this is Err.
      Returns:
      the success value.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is Err.

    • expectErr

      public E expectErr(String msg)
      Unwraps the error value if present, or throws an IllegalStateException with the given message.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to use for the exception if this is Ok.
      Returns:
      the error value.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this is Ok.

    • unwrapOrDefault

      public T unwrapOrDefault(Supplier<T> defaultSupplier)
      Returns the success value if present, otherwise returns the result of the provided supplier.
      Parameters:
      defaultSupplier - a supplier providing a default success value.
      Returns:
      the success value or a default.

    • flatten

      public <U> Result<U,E> flatten()
      If this is an Ok variant that itself contains a Result, flattens the nested Result. Otherwise, returns this Result.
      Returns:
      a flattened Result if possible; otherwise, this Result.

    • ok

      public Optional<T> ok()
      Converts this Result to an Optional containing the success value if present.
      Returns:
      an Optional with the success value, or empty if this is Err.

    • err

      public Optional<E> err()
      Converts this Result to an Optional containing the error value if present.
      Returns:
      an Optional with the error value, or empty if this is Ok.
